boat.construction_details: larch and oak planking on sawn oak frames, elm keel is original.
boat.full_description: Mary had her second full rebuild by Brian Kennell and Shaun White, Downs Boatyard, Maldon, 1996 - 2000. She is the only surviving example of an Essex oyster smack with a lute stern, reputed to have been built in 1844 and rebuilt in 1900.
boat.name: Mary
boat.short_description: Mary  is the only surviving example of an Essex oyster smack with a lute stern.
